content.html: “Does it bother you to play support all the time? Do you ever feel like it perpetuates the stereotype that women always play healers?” Listen buddy, I live for praise and trying to fix people who make bad choices, so who’s really losing here
content.value:
“Does it bother you to play support all the time? Do you ever feel like it perpetuates the stereotype that women always play healers?”

Listen buddy, I live for praise and trying to fix people who make bad choices, so who’s really losing here
